main event: A family observed three unidentified aerial objects moving in a strange and unorderly fashion in Macon, Georgia on May 7-8, 1957.
interesting points: The family secured an 8mm color motion picture film of the objects,The film and prints were submitted to the Air Force for examination,Enlargements from the black and white prints showed emulsion flaws and small white, oddly-shaped airborne objects,The objects' movements were similar to those in the Tremonton Incident,Large scale military operations were taking place in the area during the sightings.
witness description: a family observing the objects from their location
